sys_element_mapping.value:
Reminder: You have 30 days left to access 3➛...➛Name’s Mailbox and OneDrive files. 

You’ve been designated to review and manage 3➛...➛Name’s Mailbox and OneDrive files as part of APi Group’s employee offboarding process.  You will have access for 90 days. 

 

Flow Variables➛URL for One Drive access to 3➛...➛User Principal Name.

You can view the Mailbox directly in in your Outlook account (see links below for further guidance).

 

Here are some helpful links: 

How to View and BackUp an Offboarded Employee's Mailbox 

How to View and Backup an Offboarded Employee's OneDrive 

If mailbox access needs to be given to anyone else, please request access via the Mailbox Access Request
Action Required: Mailbox and OneDrive Access for {{959d0aeb-89b7-49dc-ae6f-cc435125216a.Person_Leaving.name}}

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_element_mapping.value:
Reminder: You have 30 days left to access 3➛...➛Name’s Mailbox and OneDrive files. 

You’ve been designated to review and manage 3➛...➛Name’s Mailbox and OneDrive files as part of APi Group’s employee offboarding process.  You will have access for 90 days. 

 

Flow Variables➛URL for One Drive access to 3➛...➛User Principal Name.

You can view the Mailbox directly in in your Outlook account (see links below for further guidance).

 

Here are some helpful links: 

How to View and BackUp an Offboarded Employee's Mailbox 

How to View and Backup an Offboarded Employee's OneDrive 

If mailbox access needs to be given to anyone else, please request access via the Mailbox Access Request
Action Required: Mailbox and OneDrive Access for {{959d0aeb-89b7-49dc-ae6f-cc435125216a.Person_Leaving.name}}
